attributes.action: call for car insurance companies to take into account driving experience rather than age.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most car insurance companies add a large premium onto insurance quotes if you are a driver under the age of 21. As a driver who has just passed their driving test at 25 this premium is much lower. This is unfair and all insurance companies should look at driving experience not age.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
